snippet.title: Hawthorn - Official Trailer | Women-Led Games x TGA 2024
snippet.description: Former developers from Bethesda, BioWare, and Naughty Dog bring you a sandbox RPG realm of anthropomorphic animals and fairy creatures. Play co-op or solo as you build a village of memorable NPCs, farm, craft, explore, and celebrate the seasons in an ever-changing world bigger than you. Watch the Hawthorn trailer to see gameplay and get a peek at the world of this upcoming sandbox RPG. Hawthorn will be available on PC. A Kickstarter campaign for Hawthorn launches soon.
